int __osd_xattr_get ( const struct lu_env *  env,
struct osd_object *  obj,
struct lu_buf *  buf,
const char *  name,
int *  sizep 
)

Copy an extended attribute into the buffer provided, or compute the required buffer size if buf is NULL.

On success, the number of bytes used or required is stored in sizep.

Note that no locking is done here.

Parameters:
[in] env execution environment
[in] obj object for which to retrieve xattr
[out] buf buffer to store xattr value in
[in] name name of xattr to copy
[out] sizep bytes used or required to store xattr
Return values:
0 on success
negative negated errno on failure
